extracted_text: Minimum lot size: Commercial lots shall be of sufficient size to meet the requirements of the County Health Department unless served by public water and sewer and to provide adequate siting for structures. Sites served by community water and sewer may develop at a density of four units per acre.
llm_output.rationale: This section discusses lot size requirements for the B-1 Central Business District, but does not provide a specific minimum lot size. Instead, it states that lots should be of sufficient size to meet health department requirements and provide adequate space for structures. It also mentions a density allowance for sites with water and sewer service, but does not specify a minimum lot size.
